item.title: 日本 20 年期债券销售需求与 12 个月平均水平持平
item.description: 日本 20 年期国债拍卖的需求率与 12 个月的平均水平持平，此前财政忧虑将收益率推升至数十年高位。【原文：Japan’s 20-year government bond auction drew a demand ratio that was in line with its 12-month average after fiscal concerns pushed yields to multi-decade highs.】

item.title: GIC 和富兰克林邓普顿坚守美元主导地位的信念
item.description: 新加坡政府投资私人有限公司（GIC Pte）的 Lim Chow Kiat 和富兰克林邓普顿公司（Franklin Templeton）的珍妮-约翰逊（Jenny Johnson）认为，围绕美元作为全球金融主要货币地位的疑虑被过分夸大了。【原文：Doubts surrounding the US dollar’s position as the pre-eminent currency of global finance are overblown, according to GIC Pte’s Lim Chow Kiat and Franklin Templeton’s Jenny Johnson.】

item.title: 锂供应商 SQM 创 2023 年以来最高盈利纪录
item.description: 智利锂生产商 SQM 实现了两年来最高的季度盈利，同时表明全球电池金属市场可能最终摆脱了长期供应过剩的局面。【原文：Chilean lithium producer SQM delivered the highest quarterly earnings in two years while signaling the global battery-metal market may finally be emerging from a prolonged glut.】

item.title: 首相高市顾问团成员称日本央行不大可能在 3 月前加息
item.description: 为日本首相佐佐江隆一提供咨询的一个重要小组的一位成员说，央行不太可能在 3 月前提高基准利率，因为当局需要确认大规模的额外支出正在拉动国内需求。【原文：A member of a key panel advising Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi said the central bank isn’t likely to raise its benchmark rate before March, as authorities will need to confirm that large-scale extra spending is boosting domestic demand.】

item.title: 越南警方对第二名德国活动人士展开刑事调查
item.description: 越南警方以涉嫌从事反国家活动为由，向一名居住在德国的知名律师和活动家发出了逮捕令，这是本周以同样罪名针对越南政府的第二名批评人士。【原文：Vietnam police issued an arrest warrant for a well-known lawyer and activist based in Germany for alleged anti-state activities, the second government critic in that country to be targeted this week on the same charges.】

item.title: 评级公司称菲律宾新财长有望保留政策
item.description: 在新任财政部长的领导下，菲律宾的信用状况预计不会受到影响，将菲律宾评为投资级的评级机构预计菲律宾的政策将保持连续性。【原文：The Philippines’ credit profile is expected to be unaffected under the new finance minister with rating agencies, which rank the nation as investment grade, expecting policy continuity.】

item.title: 国内资金流动和盈利复苏帮助印度股市与美国股市脱钩
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 日本总督将 "很快 "决定是否重启大型核电站
item.description: 日本新泻县知事表示，他将 "很快 "决定是否批准重启世界上最大的核电站，这一决定对整个国家意义重大。【原文：The governor of Japan’s Niigata prefecture said he will decide “soon” on whether to approve the restart of the world’s biggest nuclear power plant, a verdict that holds huge significance for the entire country.】

item.title: 中国主要债券收益率将首次低于日本
item.description: 中国的基准债券收益率即将跌破日本的基准债券收益率，这一历史性的跨越可能会重新引发人们对世界第二大经济体正在陷入上世纪 90 年代曾使其邻国陷入瘫痪的通货紧缩漩涡的担忧。【原文：China’s benchmark bond yield is poised to fall below Japan’s, a historic crossover that may reignite fears the world’s No. 2 economy is sliding into the deflationary spiral that paralyzed its neighbor in the 1990s.】

item.title: 汇丰首席执行官眼中的碎片化世界将拥有更多战略资产
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）首席执行官乔治-埃尔德里（Georges Elhedery）认为，从数据到半导体，一个 "国家安全资产 "更加分散的世界正在形成，但他表示，跨境贸易仍为该银行带来了大量机遇。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc Chief Executive Officer Georges Elhedery sees a fragmented world with more “national security assets” from data to semiconductors, but said that cross-border trade still presents the lender with massive opportunities.】

item.title: 印度央行通胀大幅失准使印度的预测受到质疑
item.description: 印度储备银行的通胀预测模型正受到经济学家越来越多的审查，因为该央行今年一直高估了价格压力，从而导致了鹰派的政策方针。【原文：The Reserve Bank of India’s inflation forecasting model is coming under increasing scrutiny from economists after the central bank consistently overestimated price pressures this year, contributing to a hawkish policy approach.】

item.title: 日本央行上田将会见财政部长和经济增长战略部长
item.description: 日本央行行长将与主要内阁大臣举行会议，讨论政府与央行的联合协议。【原文：The Bank of Japan governor is set to meet with key cabinet ministers in a gathering that’s likely to discuss the government’s joint accord with the central bank.】

item.title: 散户投资者浪潮推动巴基斯坦股市大涨 40
item.description: 散户投资者正在帮助扩大巴基斯坦股市的涨势，这标志着在经历了多年的动荡和政治不确定性之后，人们对当地股市的信心迎来了难得的时刻。【原文：Retail investors are helping extend Pakistan’s stock market surge, marking a rare moment of confidence in local shares after years of volatility and political uncertainty.】

item.title: Orbis 基金凭借人工智能以外的成功选股，回报率高达 54
item.description: 当全球基金纷纷涌入人工智能领域时，Orbis 新兴市场股票基金的 Stefan Magnusson 却丝毫不为所动。【原文：As global funds piled into artificial intelligence, Stefan Magnusson at the Orbis Emerging Markets Equity Fund was unfazed.】

item.title: Meta 因法官强调市场份额下降而避免分手
item.description: 本周二，Meta Platforms 公司在联邦反垄断法庭上取得了重大胜利，法官认为该公司无需解除对 Instagram 和 WhatsApp 的收购，因为它不是垄断企业。但法官的推理可能会让人感到刺痛。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. scored a major victory in federal antitrust court on Tuesday when a judge concluded that the company doesn’t need to unravel its acquisitions of Instagram and WhatsApp, because it’s not a monopoly. But the judge’s reasoning may sting.】

item.title: 中国债券回购新渠道交易量上升
item.description: 在中国 9 月份允许海外投资者更多进入在岸回购市场后，海外投资者正逐步增加使用新的债券回购机制来购买中国债券。【原文：Overseas investors are gradually increasing their use of a new bond repurchase facility for their purchases of Chinese bonds after the nation gave them greater access to the onshore repo market in September.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行发出长期暂停信号，澳大利亚工资增长提升
item.description: 澳大利亚上一季度的年工资增长率仍然较高，凸显了劳动力市场的紧张和生产力的持续疲软，并表明通胀压力可能需要一段时间才能降温，这对政策制定者来说是一个挑战。【原文：Australia’s annual wage growth remained elevated last quarter, underscoring a tight labor market and persistently weak productivity and suggesting inflationary pressures may take time to cool in a challenge for policy makers.】

item.title: 鲍勃-戴蒙德认为是健康的修正，而非熊市前兆
item.description: 鲍勃-戴蒙德（Bob Diamond）说，最近几天全球市场的动荡类似于 "健康的修正"，因为投资者正在努力解决如何评估技术变革因素的问题，他预计这不会恶化成熊市。【原文：Bob Diamond said turmoil in global markets in recent days resembles a “healthy correction” as investors grapple with how to assess elements of technological change and he doesn’t expect it to deteriorate into a bear market.】

item.title: 全球供应紧张，中国冶炼厂加大锌出口量
item.description: 在全球供应紧缩为海外销售打开了一扇难得的窗口之后，中国锌生产商正在加大出口力度。【原文：Chinese zinc producers are ramping up exports after a global supply squeeze opened a rare window for overseas sales.】

item.title: 竞争对手指控 Netgear诽谤 "中国 "以引发安全恐慌
item.description: 总部位于加利福尼亚州的TP-Link系统公司表示，由于有错误报道称该网络公司的技术被用于发动中国政府控制下的中国网络攻击，该公司的销售额可能会受到超过10亿美元的打击。【原文：California-based TP-Link Systems Inc. says it may take a sales hit of more than $1 billion because of erroneous reports that the networking company’s technology has been used to launch Chinese cyber attacks under Beijing’s control.】

item.title: 美国首席执行官马特-麦克兰辞职后，无人机盾牌公司股价暴跌
item.description: 无人机盾牌有限公司（DroneShield Ltd. ）的股价在其美国首席执行官辞职后暴跌，标志着这家一直在努力争取机构投资者青睐的澳大利亚国防技术公司面临的最新挑战。【原文：DroneShield Ltd. shares plummeted after its US chief resigned, marking the latest challenge for the Australian defense technology firm that’s been trying to win over institutional investors.】

item.title: 石油库存保持稳定，俄罗斯制裁风险成为焦点
item.description: 交易商在权衡一份显示美国库存增加的报告与对俄罗斯制裁后果的担忧后，石油价格趋于稳定。【原文：Oil steadied as traders weighed a report showing rising US stockpiles against concerns about the fallout from sanctions on Russia.】

item.title: 印尼央行政策博弈使利率走势更难预测
item.description: 最近，印尼央行在稳定与增长之间采取的平衡行动给市场带来的惊喜多于信号，这使得投资者在周三的利率决定前一直处于紧张状态。【原文：Bank Indonesia’s balancing act between stability and growth has lately led to more surprises than signals for markets, keeping investors on edge ahead of Wednesday’s interest rate decision.】

item.title: 在寻找合作伙伴之际，大众降低印度电动汽车开发成本
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，大众汽车公司正在将印度开发电动汽车的成本削减三分之一，并寻找当地合作伙伴，以帮助提高其微小的市场份额。【原文：Volkswagen AG is slashing costs of developing electric vehicles in India by a third and scouting for a local partner to help boost its tiny market share, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 重量级人物齐聚新加坡参加彭博新经济论坛
item.description: 2025 年 11 月 18 日星期二，新加坡，彭博新经济论坛前的准备工作。新经济论坛由彭博新闻社母公司彭博通讯社（Bloomberg LP）旗下的彭博媒体集团（Bloomberg Media Group）主办。【原文：Preparations ahead of the Bloomberg New Economy Forum in Singapore, on Tuesday, Nov. 18, 2025. The New Economy Forum is being organized by Bloomberg Media Group, a division of Bloomberg LP, the parent company of Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 投资者权衡股市忧虑和降息前景，黄金走势平稳
item.description: 投资者在权衡全球股市下跌、对科技股估值过高的不安以及美国降息预期减弱等因素后，黄金走势趋稳。【原文：Gold steadied as investors weighed a decline in global equities, unease over lofty tech valuations and fading expectations of an interest-rate cut in the US.】

item.title: B.莱利公司提交了逾期已久的报告，报告中出现了亏损而非盈利
item.description: B.Riley Financial Inc. 提交了拖延已久的今年第一季度报告，报告显示该公司亏损 1200 万美元，而不是之前预计的盈利。【原文：B. Riley Financial Inc. filed its long-delayed report for this year’s first quarter showing a loss of $12 million instead of the profit the firm had estimated earlier.】

item.title: 特朗普退出能源转型对世界意味着什么？
item.description: 本文摘自彭博经济公司为新经济论坛撰写的报告，该报告已于 10 月份付印。【原文：This piece is from a Bloomberg Economics report for the New Economy Forum which went to press in October.】

item.title: 万亿美元的人工智能估值？是的。生产力繁荣？还没有
item.description: 本文摘自彭博经济公司为新经济论坛撰写的报告，该报告已于 10 月份付印。【原文：This piece is from a Bloomberg Economics report for the New Economy Forum which went to press in October.】

item.title: 美元主导时代即将结束
item.description: 本文摘自彭博经济公司为新经济论坛撰写的报告，该报告已于 10 月份付印。【原文：This piece is from a Bloomberg Economics report for the New Economy Forum which went to press in October.】
